name: addonanalyzer-eso
description: AddonAnalyzer compares installed ESO addons against a database of known malicious, stolen, or community-reported bad addons.

scripts.dev-copy: xcopy "." "%USERPROFILE%\OneDrive\Documents\Elder Scrolls Online\live\Addons\Andy" /s /i /y /exclude:.deploy-exclude && echo Copied to live Addons folder.
